alethinophidia.map

Class MapThumb

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.map.MapGrid
      • alethinophidia.map.MapThumb

  • public class MapThumb
extends MapGrid
    Class used for creating small maps in MapChoiceMenu. MapThumb uses Rects to draw mini map on screen at the given position.
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
